title: Valid User Registration
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/users/register with valid email, password, mobile, firstName, and lastName | Check response status | Check response body for userId and authToken | Verify confirmation email is sent
expected: Response status should be 201 Created and contain userId and authToken. Confirmation email should be sent.

title: Duplicate Email Registration
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/users/register with an email that already exists in the system | Check response status | Check response body for error message
expected: Response status should be 409 Conflict and error message should be 'Email already registered'.

title: Password Validation Failure
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/users/register with a password that does not meet the criteria | Check response status | Check response body for validation error details
expected: Response status should be 400 Bad Request with specific error details about password validation.

title: Invalid Mobile Number Format
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/users/register with an invalid mobile number format | Check response status | Check response body for validation error details
expected: Response status should be 400 Bad Request with error details about mobile number format.

title: Rate Limiting Exceeded
steps: Send more than 5 registration requests from the same IP within an hour | Check response status for the 6th request
expected: Response status should be 429 Too Many Requests.
